description: Essential tools and platforms for every stage of the developer journey - from learning to building to scaling.

Essential tools and platforms for every stage of the developer journey - from learning to building to scaling.

tools.name: GitHub
tools.description: The world's leading software development platform where millions of developers collaborate on code.
tools.usageDescription: Essential for version control, code collaboration, and project management in software development.

tools.name: Visual Studio Code
tools.description: A lightweight but powerful source code editor with rich ecosystem of extensions.
tools.usageDescription: Primary code editor for most developers with extensive customization options.

tools.name: Stack Overflow
tools.description: The largest online community for programmers to learn, share knowledge, and build careers.
tools.usageDescription: Go-to platform for finding solutions to coding problems and learning from the community.

tools.name: Docker
tools.description: Platform for developing, shipping, and running applications using containerization technology.
tools.usageDescription: Streamlines application deployment and ensures consistency across different environments.

tools.name: Postman
tools.description: Collaboration platform for API development with tools for testing, documenting, and monitoring APIs.
tools.usageDescription: Essential for API development, testing, and documentation workflows.

tools.name: Figma
tools.description: Collaborative interface design tool that runs in the browser with real-time collaboration.
tools.usageDescription: Bridge between design and development with developer-friendly features.

tools.name: Netlify
tools.description: Platform for deploying and hosting modern web applications with continuous deployment from Git.
tools.usageDescription: Simplifies web deployment with automatic builds and global CDN distribution.

tools.name: Vercel
tools.description: Frontend cloud platform for static sites and serverless functions with zero-config deployments.
tools.usageDescription: Optimized for React and Next.js applications with excellent developer experience.
